content: with thanksgiving only a week away it s time to start planning for the holidays i designed a set of three holiday/winter/christmas themed appliques these appliques have so many uses add a string to the top and they are an ornament sew them onto a backpack tote or your favorite winter sweater place in a frame and you have a unique piece of home decor you could even add a rectangle back to turn them into a gift card holder the possibilities are endless christmas tree applique https //lovableloops com/patterns/free-christmas-tree-applique-crochet-pattern/ video tutorial https //youtu be/q4eegwzudue
